intro: This Product User Manual provides comprehensive details on the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS) High Resolution Layer (HRL) Croplands product, a crucial component of the vegetated land cover characteristics portfolio. It outlines the product's scope, production methodologies, and quality assessment procedures. The manual describes the various layers, including crop types, cropping patterns, and associated confidence layers, providing users with the necessary information to effectively utilise the data for environmental monitoring, agricultural policy support, and various land management applications across Europe.
